content: The Mona Lisa, one of the most famous paintings in the world, is displayed in which museum located in Paris, France?

The Mona Lisa is displayed in the Louvre Museum, which is located in Paris, France. The Louvre is one of the largest and most visited museums in the world, housing a vast collection of art and artifacts from various periods and cultures. The Mona Lisa, painted by Leonardo da Vinci in the early 16th century, is undoubtedly the most iconic piece in the museum's collection and attracts millions of visitors each year.
